grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 霜剣【ソウケン】cold sharp sword, blade of ice
幾星霜【イクセイソウ】many months and years
kun reading compounds: 霜降り【しもふり】speckled with white, salt-and-pepper (pattern, fabric, etc.), marbling (of beef), (of fish, chicken, shellfish, etc.) blanching by exposure to boiling and then icy water, formation of frost
露霜【つゆじも】frozen dew, frost and dew, years, time
